articles.description: Watch live coverage from the fourth day of the 2023 Cycling World Championships in Glasgow.
articles.title: Watch: 2023 Cycling World Championships

articles.description: England's wait for a first Netball World Cup title continues after Australia defeat the Roses to win the event for a 12th time.
articles.title: England lose Netball World Cup final to Australia

articles.description: Arsenal gave their hopes of beating Manchester City to the Premier League title a psychological boost as they defeated Pep Guardiola's side on penalties to win the Community Shield.
articles.title: Arsenal beat Man City in Community Shield shootout

articles.description: Retiring USA forward Megan Rapinoe exits the Women's World Cup stage in tears as the defending champions are knocked out on penalties.
articles.title: 'Sick joke' - Rapinoe leaves centre stage in tears

articles.description: Watch highlights as England are beaten by Australia 45-61 in their first ever Netball World Cup final.
articles.title: England lose to Australia in first World Cup final

articles.description: Bryson DeChambeau produces one of the most remarkable rounds in the history of golf on Sunday, shooting 58 to win the LIV Golf Greenbrier title.
articles.title: DeChambeau hits historic 58 in LIV Golf victory

articles.description: Manchester City boss Pep Guardiola says "the big brains" never consulted people in the game with the new injury-time rules.
articles.title: Injury-time big brains never consulted us - Guardiola

articles.description: Oval Invincibles and Welsh Fire play out the first tie in The Hundred after a thrilling finish at the Kia Oval.
articles.title: Invincibles and Fire play out thrilling tie

articles.description: Dutchman Mathieu van der Poel recovers from a nasty crash to win a thrilling men's road race at the Cycling World Championships in Glasgow.
articles.title: Van der Poel wins men's road race world title

articles.description: Watch highlights as Arsenal beat Manchester City 4-1 on penalties, after Leandro Trossard's 101st-minute equaliser, to win the Community Shield at Wembley.
articles.title: Arsenal beat Man City to win Community Shield
